thread.title: Padmavati row: Karni Sena chief makes shocking allegations against Sanjay Leela Bhansali
thread.title_full: Padmavati row: Karni Sena chief makes shocking allegations against Sanjay Leela Bhansali

author: FE Online
title: Padmavati row: Karni Sena chief makes shocking allegations against Sanjay Leela Bhansali
text:
Padmavati row: Karni Sena chief makes shocking allegations against Sanjay Leela Bhansali Padmavati row: Karni Sena chief makes shocking allegations against Sanjay Leela Bhansali Amidst reports of Bollywood director Sanjay Leela Bhansali leaving Jodhpur with his unit, Rajput Karni Sena founder Lokendra Singh Kalvi today said, "We had a meeting with Bhansali and his men and we agree to forget the incident." By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: January 28, 2017 2:43 PM Rajput Karni Sena founder Lokendra Singh Kalvi. (ANI) 
Amidst reports of Bollywood director Sanjay Leela Bhansali leaving Jodhpur with his unit, Rajput Karni Sena founder Lokendra Singh Kalvi today said, “We had a meeting with Bhansali and his men and we agree to forget the incident.” 
Bhansali was slapped by Karni Sena members yesterday for allegedly distorting history for his upcoming movie ‘Padmavati’. 
Kalvi, however, said “we can forget the incident and can’t forget the history.” He has also called for CBI probe into the incident if anything wrong his “boys” had done. Kalvi was speaking at a press conference to to clarify his stand on the controversy.
